document_data.name: Nas Trango Shan
document_data.mainbody: '''Nas Trango Shan, '''or''' North Guardian Peak''', was a mountain in [[Khazari]].
document_data.Geography: Nas Trango Shan was one of two prominent mountains in Khazari, the other being [[Ahs Trango Shan]], that formed the nation's eastern border.
document_data.Description:
At {{SI|15700|ft}}, Nas Trango Shan was the larger of the two mountains, between which sat the [[Broken Wall Pass]], part of the [[Silk Road]].

The slopes were barren and desolate, and offered a good view of the fortress [[Luntse Dzong]] on the southern peak.
